```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
library(outliers)
```


```{r}
chi_square <- function(x) {
  while(chisq.out.test(x)$p.value < 0.01) {
    str <- chisq.out.test(x)$alternative
    print(str)
    n <- as.numeric(unlist(regmatches(str,
                                    gregexpr("(?<=value)(.*)(?=is an outlier)", str, perl = T))))
    x <- x[x != n]
    print(length(x))
  }
}
```

```{r}
chi_square(s_norm$value)
```



```{r}
while(chisq.out.test(x)$p.value < 0.01) {

                                    gregexpr("(?<=value)(.*)(?=is an outlier)", str, perl = T))))

}
```
